ABA.F.summary: ALBA SE provides environmental system services in Europe. It offers recycling services, including transport packaging, sales packaging/dual system, packaging, Kraft paper bags, deposit solutions, recycled plastics, energy saving lamps and fluorescent tubes, and sorting and battery recycling; consultation services, such as packaging optimization, optimize and recycle, EU chemicals regulation, Europe-wide packaging licensing, waste officer and commercial waste regulation, and clearing solutions; and reuse services, including IT and communication, printer cartridges, and disposal of printer cartridges for specialist dealers. The company also provides logistics and supply chain management services, such as reusable pooling, pallet pooling, reverse logistics, and ICT logistics; disposal and waste management services; recycling services; and facility solutions, including property and facility management. ALBA SE was formerly known as INTERSEROH SE and changed its name to ALBA SE in July 2012. The company was founded in 1991 and is based in Cologne, Germany.
